name: EcoLogic LLC
overview:
Formed in January 2010, EcoLogic owns, manufactures and markets the Eco-Pure brand of additives for plastic products worldwide. Eco-Pure is an organic additive that renders products manufactured from plastic resins biodegradable in landfills and composting environments. Biodegradation facilitated by Eco-Pureâ„¢ has been confirmed using ASTM D5511. Eco-Pureâ„¢ is scientifically unique, validated and certified for biodegradation.

Our goal is to drive value for our customers by providing them solutions to meet increasing government, industry and consumer demands for environmental sustainability and biodegradability.

For more info visit: http://ecologic-llc.com/company/
